mapper.insert:
insert into save_path (no, sub_problem_no, save_no, package_path) values
((select sp.no from save_path sp where sp.sub_problem_no = ${item.subProblemNo } and sp.save_no = ${item.saveNo }), ${item.subProblemNo }, ${item.saveNo }, '${item.packagePath }')
on duplicate key update sub_problem_no = values(sub_problem_no), save_no = values(save_no), package_path= values(package_path)
